structure.unit: OFFENSES AGAINST PUBLIC HEALTH AND SAFETY

law.text:
KRS 438.282 and 438.284 shall not apply to:
A unit of federal, state, or local government, or special district, or an agency or instrumentality thereof;
A person engaged in the business of electronic monitoring of an individual as a condition of that individual's community supervision, parole, mandatory supervision, pretrial release, or release on bail relating to a judicial proceeding; or
A person not engaged in the business of personal emergency response system provider as defined in KRS 438.280.
law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 102, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2008.
